context: Do you know if the author of Lolita wrote any other popular books?
yes it was written by Vladimir Vladimirovich Nabokov. She also wrote The Strange Case of Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde., Pnin , Pale Fire
Can you tell me more about Pale Fire?
resp: YEs its influenced by Influenced By`: Marcel Proust, and Pale Fire has spawned a wide. variety of interpretations and a large body of written criticism, which Finnish literary scholar Pekka Tammi estimated in 1995 as more than 80 studies. It was ranked 53rd on the list of the Modern Library 100 Best Novels and 1st on the American literary critic Larry McCaffery's 20th Century’s Greatest Hits: 100 English-Language Books of Fiction. It is more poetic version and contains 999-line poem. Do you like poetry
